CatDescriptText: The Stanley Theatre was located at 205-207 7th Street in downtown Pittsburgh.
TitMainTitle: Exterior of Stanley Theatre with marquee reading: Cab Calloway and His Jumping Jive Jubilee featuring Bill Bailey Holmes and Jean - Dotty Saulters, the Cavelettes, J. C. Heard, Jonah Jones, Tyree Glenn, and Milton Hinton; screen "Maisie Goes to Reno" Ann Sothern and John Hodiak, Downtown
